title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“ 'Incredible' is too conservative an adjective. They are unbelievable!” [From a sportscast on Channel 4, 6 January 1993. Submitted by Dorothy Branson, Kansas City, Missouri.]
